name: Powder Heal
effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Fragrance Trap
effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, once during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot.

name: Counterattack
effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Shell Armor
effect: This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attacks.

name: Water Shuriken
effect: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Volt Charge
effect: Once during your turn, you may take a Lightning Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Shadowy Spellbind
effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.

name: Sleep Pendulum
effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Psy Shadow
effect: Once during your turn, you may take 1 Psychic Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the Pokémon in the Active Spot.

name: Gas Leak
effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Poisoned.

name: Poison Coating
effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Guts
effect: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

name: Guarded Grill
effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.

name: Reckless Shearing
effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

name: Fragrant Flower Garden
effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Thick Fat
effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from fire or water Pokémon.

name: Levitate
effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Fighting Coach
effect: Attacks used by your Fighting Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Nightmare Aura
effect: Whenever you attach a Dark Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Power Link
effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Forest Breath
effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a GRASS Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your GRASS Pokémon.

name: Speed Link
effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

name: Vigor Link
effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less Energy.

name: Snowy Terrain
effect: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Resilience Link
effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

name: CHECK
effect: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

name: Cunning Link
effect: Once during your turn, if you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, you may do 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Sky Support
effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokemon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.

name: Fabled Luster
effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Retreat Directive
effect: Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost.

name: Counterattack
effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Broken-Space Bellow
effect: Once during your turn, you may take a Psychic Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

name: Poison Coating
effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Comforting Song
effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon.

name: Wimp Out
effect: During your first turn, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

name: Melodious Healing
effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 30 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Innards Out
effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 50 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Safeguard
effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex.

name: Flower Shield
effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any Psychic Energy attached recovers from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Psychic Connect
effect: Once during your turn, you may move all Psychic Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Psychic Pokémon.

name: Offload Pass
effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move all Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Fur Coat
effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Rising Road
effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

name: Comatose
effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to it, it is now Asleep.

name: Intimidating Fang
effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon do −20 damage.

name: Thunderclap Flash
effect: At the end of your first turn, take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Illuminate
effect: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

name: Heal Block
effect: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) can't be healed.

name: More Poison
effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon takes +10 damage from being Poisoned.

name: Steel Spikes
effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Guard Dog Visage
effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Active Pokémon cost 1 more.

name: Ultra Thrusters
effect: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Ultra Beast with 1 of your Benched Ultra Beasts.
